Support to DPRK Reiterated by Tunisian Party 
   Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Mouhammad Bouchiha, secretary general of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia, said that the Political Bureau of his party reiterates its support to the DPRK standing up against the U.S. moves.
 The secretary general clarified this stand when referring to the Party's foreign relations at the meeting of its Political Bureau held on Oct. 17.

Ministries of Electric Power Industry and Coal Industry Set Up 
   Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on Oct. 26 issued a decree on removing the Ministry of Electric Power and Coal Industries and setting up the Ministry of Electric Power Industry and the Ministry of Coal Industry.

articles.content:
Greetings to Turkmen President
   Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Turkmen President Saparmurat Niyazov on Friday on the occasion of the 15th national day of his country.
 The message wished the President success in his responsible work, expressing the belief that the bilateral ties of friendship would continue to develop on good terms.
